summary: Gives a tiny amount of experience for picking up ingredients.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will increase your alchemy skill if you collect ingredients in the wild.

Features:
- gives a tiny amount of XP towards alchemy on gathering plants
- no XP if picked up from containers or vendors
- no XP for non-plant ingredients like eyes, bones etc.

Picking the proper plants is part of Alchemy and should give some sort of bonus. The experience gain is really not much and only noticeable in the lower levels, but you know it is there.

1.2
Removed debug message and slightly increased XP gain

Compatibility:
This should not interfere with any other mods in any load order after Skyrim.esm and Update.esm.
author: disi30
